description: This file defines a Model class for a Todo application, handling CRUD operations and counting todos, interfacing with a storage backend.

classes.name: Model
classes.description: A class representing the Todo model, managing storage interactions for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and counting todos.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with a given title and saves it to storage.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Retrieves todo items from storage based on query: by ID, by object match, or all.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a todo item identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a todo item by ID from storage.

methods.name: removeAll
methods.description: Removes all todo items from storage.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Counts active, completed, and total todos.
